Events.title: Events
Events.desc: Want to participate a little bit more in the community? Want to win ARKADE themed dinos? Try out our <#472160668154593291>! Hand made by our event team, feel free to submit any suggestions to the Event Coordinator.

fields.title: Prizes!
fields.value: All of the ARKADE Events have participation prizes available to all who show up as well as prizes for winning that weeks event.

Fireside FS Firesides.title: Fireside
Fireside FS Firesides.desc: Fireside chat is a weekly community event that happens every friday at `7pm EDT`. The admin team uses this opportunity to make announcements, address concerns and listen to feedback from our community!

fields.title: Questions
fields.value: Have any questions to ask but would prefer to message us? Tune into Fireside and send your questions to <#475081332280655892>.

fields.title: Recap
fields.value: Missed Fireside chat? Don't worry! There's a recap available in <#483091850161553408> for you to catch up on.

In-Game Shop ARKShop.title: In-Game Shop
In-Game Shop ARKShop.desc: ARKADE offers an in game shop to purchase resources, gear and tools, dinos, saddles, and more! Earn coins by playing in game, 20 coins every 20 minutes you're logged onto our server.

OGS Offline Guard System.title: OGS Information
OGS Offline Guard System.desc:
You must be a tribe rep to redeem your OGS terminal.
This provides all structures within a 30 foundation radius with 4x HP while offline.
Tribe reps can type **`/kit ogs`** (lowercase) in-game to redeem their OGS terminal.
If you need an additional terminal (limit one per map) you can submit a ticket.

Safetag ST.title: Fun with [Safe] tags!
Safetag ST.desc: [SAFE] tags are a protection system put in place to help tribes and players who have receive excessive amounts of structure damage or loss of creatures due to a raid recover. Tribes will be granted 100% damage protection with in a region around there base for a limited amount of time. Each [Safe] tag is judged on a case by case basics and the time awarded is based on the damage received.

fields.title: Safe Tag Rules
fields.value: Please read over our [Safe] tag rules at <#556891543391174657>. Violating these rules can result in the reduction or removal of your [Safe] tag.

fields.title: Safe Tag Requirements
fields.value:
Tribe Reps can create a ticket in <#566095595476090881> with the following info to request a [Safe] tag.```-Which map your base is on and approximate coordinates
-Screenshots of tribe-log showing as much destruction as you can
-Pictures of the damage```

Safetag Rules Saferules STR.title: [SAFE] tag Rules and Punishments
Safetag Rules Saferules STR.desc: You've been granted a [Safe] tag. Please do not pick up and move your OGS terminal while you [Safe] tag is active. This will cancel your [Safe] tag and an admin will not reset it. Please remember that all structures inside the [Safe] bubble are protected, but your dinos are not. Make sure you read the following [Safe] tag rules and punishments.

fields.title: [SAFE] tag Rules
fields.value:
```◈ While under the effects of the [Safe] Tag protection, tribes are not allowed to raid or destroy any other tribes structures across all maps, but any other forms of PvP are acceptable.
◈ No impeding of [Safe] Tribes around their protection bubble.
◈ It is the responsibility of the tribe owner to remove the [Safe] tag from the tribes name at the end of the [Safe] Tag protection.```

fields.title: [SAFE] tag Punishments
fields.value:
```Breaking any of the [Safe] Tag rules and guidelines will have punishments associated with the [Safe] Tag system. These punishments could include, but are not limited to:
◈ A reduction or removal of your current [Safe] Tag.
◈ Reduced time or no [Safe] Tag offered in future scenarios.
◈ Players kicked/banned for a period of time.```

Sellable Resources.title: Sellable Resource
Sellable Resources.desc: The "sellable" resource is no longer used on ARKADE. last season it was used to transfer coins between maps, but now the shop is cluster wide and coins transfer automatically!

fields.title: Tickets should NOT be requested for opening for the following reasons:
fields.value:
◈ The recovery of lost creatures or items.
◈ The recovery of players or any creatures caught under the mesh.
◈ Lost structures to Auto-Decay or wild dinos.
◈ General Questions or technical Support. (Use the <#472623301290622993> channel)
◈ Server crashes.  (Ping @Arkade Admin in <#472623301290622993>)

fields.title: Tickets should be requested for opening for the following reasons.
fields.value:
◈ A player or tribe is suspected of being  in violation of any of the rules.
◈ Tribe ownership transfer due to an error or missing tribe owner.

TicketPvPRules TicketsPvPRules TicketRul.title: Ticket Rules and Information - PvP
TicketPvPRules TicketsPvPRules TicketRul.desc: ARKADE uses a Tribe Representative system that allows tribes 1 or tribes of 7 or greater  2 members to represent their tribe on discord. This role allows us to help support the community and helps tribes report any issues that might arise. Tribe Representatives have the ability to open tickets to report issues their tribe might be experiencing to the ARKADE Admin Team. Alternatively, tickets can be opened by asking a ARKADE Team member in the #community-support channel. Tribe Representatives also have access to allows a tribe the ability to gain the Safe Tag protection. Apply for Tribe Rep in the #request-for-tribe-rep  channel.

fields.title: Tickets should NOT be requested for opening for the following reasons:
fields.value:
◈ The recovery of lost creatures or items.
◈ The recovery of players or any creatures caught under the mesh.
◈ Lost structures to Auto-Decay or wild dinos.
◈ General Questions or technical Support. (Use the <#472623301290622993> channel)
◈ Server crashes.  (Ping @Arkade Admin in <#472623301290622993>)

fields.title: Tickets should be requested for opening for the following reasons.
fields.value:
◈ A player or tribe is suspected of being  in violation of any of the rules.
◈ Safe tag request after being a victim of a raid.
◈ Tribe ownership transfer due to an error or missing tribe owner.

Tribe Representatives TribeRepresentativ.title: Tribe Representative Information
Tribe Representatives TribeRepresentativ.desc: A Tribe Rep is a trusted member of your tribe who carries the responsibility to communicate between the Admin team the rest of your tribe. Tribe Reps will be responsible for creating tickets, redeeming [Safe] tags, and communicating with admins should an issue arrise.

fields.title:
_ _
Tribe Rep Requirements
fields.value:
Please provide the following info in <#535668637877534740>. If your tribe contains 7 or more members you are eligible for a second Tribe Rep.
```-Screenshot of your tribe management window
-Character name in game
-Screenshot of approval from your tribe owner (If you are not the tribe owner)
-How you found Ark Arkade```

fields.title:
_ _
Tribe Rep Perks/Responsibilities
fields.value:
-Being a Tribe Representative gives access to a channel in Discord specifically meant for Reps, and allows a Rep to cast a tribe vote when polls are introduced for the community to have a voice in altering specific gameplay mechanics.
-Being a Tribe Rep also grants you the ability to open tickets to our admin team.  To open a ticket go to the <#566095595476090881> channel and follow the directions in the pinned comment.

Server Wipes ServerWipes.title: Server Wipes
Server Wipes ServerWipes.desc:
The last PvP wipe for 12 man was on `3/22`.  ARKADE does not operate under a set wipe schedule.  A wipe will generally be considered approximately every 3 months, when gameplay tends to start getting stagnant and a cluster rejuvenation is deemed to be beneficial to the player population.  A wipe has been announced for 5/24

The last PvP wipe for 6 man was on `4/26`.  ARKADE does not operate under a set wipe schedule.  A wipe will generally be considered approximately every 6 weeks, when gameplay tends to start getting stagnant and a cluster rejuvenation is deemed to be beneficial to the player population.  A wipe has been announced for 5/31

The PvE servers do not wipe.

ServerETA.title: Server ETA
ServerETA.desc: We understand that currently we are having server issues.  We are working very hard at correcting this, everytime we are delayed increases the amount of time to correct the issue.  The ETA of the server being back up is between now and never
